5.eng-name: Establishing the Prayer and the Sunnah Regarding Them

hadiths.text: It was narrated from Sahl bin Sa’d As-Sa’idi that the Messenger of Allah (ﷺ) said:“The Tasbih is for men and clapping is for women.”

chapter.ara-name: باب التَّسْبِيحِ لِلرِّجَالِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ وَالتَّصْفِيقِ لِلنِّسَاءِ
chapter.eng-name: The Tasbih is for men during the Prayer and clapping is for women
